Our Portfolio

Explore our successful projects that have helped businesses transform their digital presence and operations.

Interactive online learning system with progress tracking and certification.

E-commerce Platform

A fully custom online store built with integrated payment processing (Stripe, PayPal), real-time inventory management, and a user-friendly admin dashboard. Launched in 2024, it increased client sales by 35% within six months.

Technologies: React, Node.js, MongoDB, AWS

Azra Mobile App

A fintech mobile application that enables secure payment processing, financial tracking, and budget management. The app features biometric authentication, real-time transaction notifications, and an intuitive user interface designed for optimal user experience.

Technologies: Flutter, Firebase, RESTful APIs, Secure Payment Gateways

BambaSwap Crypto Exchange

A cryptocurrency exchange application that allows users to buy, sell, and trade digital assets securely. Features include real-time market data, price alerts, secure wallet integration, and comprehensive transaction history. The app has seen a 45% increase in active users since launch.

Technologies: React Native, Blockchain APIs, Redux, Secure Authentication

Nyumbani Real Estate App

A comprehensive real estate marketplace application that connects property buyers, sellers, and agents. Features include property listings with high-quality images, virtual tours, in-app messaging, appointment scheduling, and mortgage calculators. The platform has facilitated over 500 property transactions since launch.

Technologies: Flutter, Google Maps API, Firebase, Cloud Storage

Cloud Migration Project

Migrated a legacy enterprise system to AWS, implementing custom monitoring with CloudWatch and auto-scaling. Completed in 2023, reducing operational costs by 25%.

Technologies: AWS (EC2, RDS, Lambda), Terraform

Financial Dashboard

A real-time financial analytics platform with customizable reporting and data visualization. Delivered for a fintech startup, enhancing decision-making speed by 50%.

Technologies: Vue.js, Python (Django), PostgreSQL

×

Logistics Management System

An end-to-end supply chain platform with real-time tracking and optimization algorithms. Implemented for a global logistics firm, reducing delivery times by 20%.

Technologies: Angular, Spring Boot, MySQL, Google Maps API

×

E-Learning Platform

An interactive online learning system with progress tracking, quizzes, and certification. Built for an educational institute, increasing course completion rates by 30%.

Technologies: React, Express.js, MongoDB, AWS S3

OUR APPROACH

Our Development Process

We follow a structured, collaborative approach to ensure your project is delivered on time, within budget, and exceeds expectations.

1. Discovery & Planning

We begin by understanding your business goals, target audience, and project requirements through in-depth consultations.

2. Design & Prototyping

Our design team creates intuitive interfaces and user experiences, with interactive prototypes for your feedback.

3. Development & Testing

Our development team brings designs to life using the latest technologies, with rigorous testing at every stage.

4. Deployment & Support

We ensure smooth deployment and provide ongoing maintenance and support to keep your solution running optimally.
